meanings.definition: Situated inside or further in; internal.
meanings.sent1: The inner part of the house was cozy and warm.
meanings.sent2: She felt a sense of peace in her inner self.
meanings.sent3: The inner workings of the clock were a mystery to him.
meanings.sent4: Her inner strength shone through during tough times.
meanings.sent5: The inner beauty of the garden was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the mind or spirit.
meanings.sent1: His inner thoughts were filled with creativity.
meanings.sent2: She found solace in her inner beliefs.
meanings.sent3: The inner voice in his head told him to be brave.
meanings.sent4: Her inner demons haunted her dreams at night.
meanings.sent5: The inner peace she sought finally found her.
